items.value: Romana is missing a friend and need your help again!

Hello Dude,
I am looking for a friend who has not yet been invited to my Party.
However, nobody knows where he is, can you look for him?
I give you this Card and you give it to him when you find him.

Please come back to me when you find him.
I'm very worried, he's wearing something blue and a Cap on.
His name is Michael and he was last seen in the Center.
i will try to find him for you!

Thank you for helping find Michael!

As I said, he wears a blue Shirt and has a Cap.
You will find it for sure!

You got:
1x Birthday Invitation Card (for Michael)
i will try my best to find him!
